references:
We consider a system comprised by a single pico-cellÂ [14].
The total number of antennas at the edge server is M=16ğ‘€16M=16 and the total number of devices is K=10ğ¾10K=10.
We consider an image classification learning task using the MNIST dataset and a multi-class logistic regression as loss
function.
The samples per device Nksubscriptğ‘ğ‘˜N_{k} are randomly assigned to the devices in a non-IID manner, which ensures that a device will
have tens or thousands of samples, and consider 323232 bits encoding, i.e., Ak=32â€‹Nksubscriptğ´ğ‘˜32subscriptğ‘ğ‘˜A_{k}=32N_{k}.
We consider  maximum ratio combining (MRC) at the receiver and two transmitter beamforming options namely, MRT and ZF.
The test accuracy is the performance indicator used for learning tasks because it represents the percentage of correct
predictions.
The parameters necessary to obtain the numerical results are listed in TableÂ I.
